verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Join all the glorious names of wisdom, love, and pow'r, that ever mortals knew, that angels ever bore; all are too mean to speak His worth, too mean to set my Savior forth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Great Prophet of my God, my tongue would bless Thy Name; by Thee the joyful news of our salvation came - the joyful news of sins forgiv'n, of hell subdued, and peace with heav'n.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus, my great High Priest, offered His blood and died; my guilty conscience seeks no sacrifice beside: His pow'rful blood did once atone, and now it pleads before the throne.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My dear Almighty Lord, my Conqueror and King, Thy sceptre and Thy sword, Thy reigning grace I sing; Thine is the pow'r; behold I sit, in willing bonds, beneath Thy feet.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Now let my soul arise, and tread the tempter down; my Captain leads me forth to conquest and a crown. A feeble saint shall win the day, though death and hell obstruct the way.
